title: Briefing: Paved with good intentions? The role of aid in reaching the Millennium Development Goals
abstract: This article is the final instalment in a series of briefings addressing issues raised in The Commission for Africa Report and the G-8 summit in Gleneagles in 2005
publisher: Oxford University Press on behalf of the Royal African Society
